content.rendered:
The Ehlanzeni FET College, Ehlanzeni College Prospectus consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and course information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • School fees/tuition
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Ehlanzeni College admission process.

You can use the information in these prospectuses to find suitable courses and apply for admission to Ehlanzeni FET College (Ehlanzeni College).

  • Ehlanzeni College Student Portal
Note: You should read the Ehlanzeni College prospectus carefully, especially if you are a new applicant as it gives a more comprehensive understanding of your application.

Ehlanzeni FET College Prospectus 2024

The Ehlanzeni College Prospectus can be downloaded in PDF format from the college website, www.ehlanzenifet.co.za.

  • EHLANZENI COLLEGE PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD
